text: Coonoor resident Premnath and his wife Meenakshi were killed in an accident on Thursday night in Katteri Poonga in the Nilgiris district. The Police said that the car that the couple was travelling in fell into a gorge and the two died on the spot. They were returning after meeting their daughter, a student of an engineering college in Coimbatore.
title: Two die as car falls into gorge
